title: League of Legends not responding properly
body: Hello from couple of days i have one issue with the game. Every time when i am trying to log in in to the game, the logging time is extreamly long. I mean i have to wait to log me in like ~3-4 mins every time and this is not the end of the problem, after i am logged in to the client when i am trying to start a game i have to wait the same amount of time to start searching for a game for no reason.

replies.body: You could have an unstable connection that's struggling to get you to the game servers and matchmaking.  Over time this could get worse and time you out, so it's really important to troubleshoot and find the cause!  My recommendation in this case would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and test it out in a custom game.  Let me know if you have any questions!

We haven't seen any issues with riot servers, and have no issue saying if it was so.  League is always online so connection issues are common, so our troubleshoot guide is crucial towards resolving these issues.
